reviewText: This is one of the worst exercise videos I've ever seen. There is a super short dance that doesn't include much instruction. I found it to be poor quality and not very good for anything but learning a short dance that couldn't be used in any real applications.

Any woman who wants to feel sexy and in shape... this is the video for you. It is short, fun and easy to do. Once you get the hang of the steps (which won't take long) You will feel awesome. I cant rave enough about this video. I use it every day!!!!! There are more videos in this set that are equally as good but if you are just getting back into working out this is the perrrrrfect one for you.

Before you buy this video. I just want you to know the "workout" is only SEVEN MINUTES LONG! The rest of the dvd is watching andrea lin talk about her "method". Talking about how dressing sexy will help you lose weight by boosting your confidence . Then there is a short tutorial. This is NOT  workout dvd. Its a dvd that teaches you one simple dance routine.
